lp.name: light punch
lp.createBlock: if (this.current !== 1) return; let b = new Block(BlockType.attack, instance, frame.width/2, 20, instance.flip ? instance.x - frame.width * 1.5 : instance.x + frame.width, instance.y - 60); b.damage = 'hm'; b.source = instance.owner; return b

lk.name: light kick
lk.createBlock: if (this.current !== 1) return; let b = new Block(BlockType.attack, instance, frame.width - 20, 20, instance.flip ? instance.x - frame.width * 2 + 20 : instance.x + frame.width, instance.y - 40); b.damage = 'hm'; b.source = instance.owner; return b

hp.name: heavy punch
hp.createBlock: if (this.current !== 2) return; let b = new Block(BlockType.attack, instance, 45, 35, instance.flip ? instance.x - frame.width  : instance.x + frame.width - 45, instance.y - 40); b.damage = 'hm'; b.source = instance.owner; return b

attBlocks.hit: const {att} = data; att.source.setStatus('fall', true); att.source.currentAction.current = att.source.currentAction.loop.start
const {att} = data; att.source.setStatus('fall', true); att.source.currentAction.current = att.source.currentAction.loop.start

drop.desc: 摔倒的情况，需要根据当前的高度决定下落的帧数，倒地之后应当自动起身
drop.name: drop

frames.execution: console.log('shoot'); const {character, battle} = data; let bullet = character.getSprite('bullet'); bullet.y = character.y; bullet.x = character.x;battle.addToStage(bullet);
const {character, action, controller} = data; let motion = controller.getStr(); if(motion !== '') {motion = 'kuihua'} ; if (character.status === 'kuihua' && motion === 'kuihua'){ action.total = 13;}
const {character, action, controller} = data; let motion = controller.getStr(); if(motion !== '') {motion = 'kuihua'} ; if (character.status === 'kuihua' && motion === 'kuihua'){ action.total = 31;}
const {character, action, frameIndex} = data; character.move(); character.y = character._y - Math.sin((frameIndex - 13)/14*Math.PI) * character.jump * 0.8;
const {character, action, frameIndex} = data; character.move(); character.y = character._y - Math.sin((frameIndex - 13)/14*Math.PI) * character.jump * 0.8;

console.log('触发必杀技'); const {action, battle} = data; battle.setBg('#333');action.total = 21;

attBlocks.hit: const {att, tgt} = data; att.source.currentAction.current = 22; att.source.currentAction.total = 100; const enemy = tgt.owner; const box = enemy.box(); if (att.source.flip) { att.source.x = box.x + box.width + att.source.currentFrame.image.width } else {att.source.x = box.x - att.source.currentFrame.image.width}

bullet.name: bullet
bullet.createBlock: let b = new Block(BlockType.attack, instance, frame.width, frame.height, instance.flip ? instance.x - frame.width : instance.x, instance.y); b.source = instance.owner; return b

attBlocks: const {frame, instance} = data; block.width = frame.image.width; block.height = frame.image.height; block.x = instance.flip ? instance.x - frame.image.width : instance.x; block.y = instance.y; block.source = instance.owner; block.execute = () => instance.x = 10000

const {frame, instance} = data; block.width = frame.image.width; block.height = frame.image.height; block.x = instance.flip ? instance.x - frame.image.width : instance.x; block.y = instance.y; block.source = instance.owner; block.execute = () => instance.x = 10000
